sentences.en: For people of a certain age, such anecdotes might evince something like nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 对于某个年龄层的人, 像这样的轶事令人有怀旧的感觉.

sentences.en: She at last condescended to evince awareness of his proximity.
sentences.cn: 最后她才纡贵屈尊地表示出她注意到他在旁边.

sentences.en: She evinced no surprise at seeing them together.
sentences.cn: 看到他们在一起，她没有表露出惊讶。

sentences.en: Thirdly, Live life without fear, confront all obstacles and evince that you can overcome them.
sentences.cn: 第三, 活着,便不要畏惧, 要勇于面对一切生活的磨难,并且表明你能够克服他们.

trans.tran_en: to show a feeling or have a quality in a way that people can easily notice
